summary: I use KDE Plasma 6 as my desktop environment.  Among my petty grievances is the fact that KDE does not provide a way to automatically switch themes.  In my case, I like to use a light theme during the day, and a dark theme as soon as the sun sets...

summary:
For various reasons I had occasion this evening to give GoToSocial a try so I installed it on my server that's running Coolify but hit a couple of issues which I was able to work around with the help of Lewis and Brandon. 
First up because it's running a reverse proxy, I needed the third option in the Docker compose file. 
ports:  # - "443:8080"  ## For letsencrypt:  #- "80:80"  ## For reverse proxy setups:  - "127...
title: Installing GoToSocial on Coolify
